goals.active: Zojja wishes you to visit her laboratory.
goals.complete: I went to see Zojja at her laboratory near Rata Sum. She said that Snaff's first apprentice, Kudu, was showing off a new invention...that looks suspiciously like a rip-off of my old invention, the VAC weather-changer. Now I'm going to go see if that rat's plagarized my work.

goals.active: Obtain a copy of your original schematics.
goals.complete: Kudu's invention is clearly based on my design, but how to prove it? Hopefully, my schematics are still in the archives.
Kudu set fire to the annex...and the backups. I'm really starting to hate that guy.
